modName: Temptress Vixen Transforms Into A Flame Atronach
summary: This mod turns Vixen of the Temptress Race into a Flame Atronach whenever she enters a battle, and obviously she returns to normal Vixen form whenever a battle is over.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0ItZw.png[[/IMG][/center]

[size=\"7\"][color=\"#FFFF00\"][b]Created a separate Eola version: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21167/[/b][/color][/size]

Added transformation effect! 

[b]Video Link:[/b][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sFuXXrPuQ3I]Temptress Vixen Transforms Into A Flame Atronach V2[/url]
[center][youtube]sFuXXrPuQ3I[/youtube][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oF1Uq.png[/IMG][/center]
This mod turns Vixen of the Temptress Race into a Flame Atronach whenever she enters a battle, and obviously she returns to normal Vixen form whenever a battle is over.

My thanks to Psychos1s and Brokefoot  for this great mod and for giving me permission to tweak it!

The original file is needed: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717]	
Temptress Race by Psychos1s and Brokefoot[/url]

Install the Temptress Race by Psychos1s and Brokefoot as normal, and then overwrite my files to your skyrim/data folder.

EDIT:  xlord2 reminded me that a clean save is necessary. I know it is a pain in the neck, but hey, if we wanted the easy life we\'d Skyrim on consoles.

Dismiss Vixen. New save. Uninstall Vixen. New save. Install Vixen, add my file, overwrite. Ask her to join you for another bout of venturing!

[b]Video Link:[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWgcOX90O0o]Temptress Vixen Transforms Into A Flame Atronach V1[/url]
[center][youtube]VWgcOX90O0o[/youtube][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1XUSq.png[/IMG][/center]

Any weapons that you give her, she will drag it at her feet in  Flame Atronach form.  She doesn\'t need any weapons anyway since she transforms into a  Flame Atronach.

The Flame Atronach has no stagger animations, so when Vixen gets to zero hit points, she will just stand there in Flame Atronach form doing nothing. So if you are wondering why she is just standing there not doing anything, it\'s because she is trying to recover health.

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3l2MX.png[/IMG][/center]

Psychos1s and Brokefoot for the original great mod.

Tytanis for saving me at the last minute in a Nexus chat session.

The Nexus. I\'m a Premium member for a reason! This is a great place with great people!

Average Porcupine on the Bethesda forum for helping me with the transformation effect. What a lifesaver!

Bethesda. !Como no!
author: curme
